overview:
There’s nothing he’d rather do than help people find the adventure of a lifetime.

Shivam has been a traveller all his life, travelling for his is akin to breathing. He lives, breathes, writes and reads travel all the time. He has an insatiable thirst for experiencing new places and cultures.

Shivam is a Fashion Designing graduate, an avid biker and backpacker. He started his career from working in heath care KPO to fulfill his dream to travel. After completing his graduation in Fashion Designing he worked as a Fashion Editor for Shoes & Accessories Magazine and has also assisted Fashion Designers in fashion weeks as a freelancer.

In his college years Shivam had won many awards in Branding, Visual Display and Garment Designing. He also has a passion for Photography.

Shivam also has been a Social worker since he was in school and has worked with the Lions Club Delhi for serving the local community and making a better tomorrow for everyone. He worked for saving the girl child a campaign against Female Infanticide. Following which he joined Center For Social Research where he worked for A Safe Delhi for Women and Women Empowerment.

Shivam then decided to pursue his dream to make people find the adventure of a lifetime and joined Roads Less Travelled in the Branding and Marketing Department. He also leads bike expeditions for the company.

After Joining Roads Less Travelled, he introduced the concept of cycling as a regular activity and was also behind the Logo designing of the brand.
